text: Niscaya amiye'i ta'oraata aratirna karaichilo, tata achila hidayata arau jyoti, iyara madhyamata iyahudisakalara babe phayacala pradana karaichila anugata nabisakale arau raabbanisakale lagate bidbanasakale'o. Karana te'omlokaka allahara kitabara raksaka hicape dayitba diya haichila arau te'omloka achila iyara oparata saksi. Seye tomaloke manuhaka bhaya nakaraiba kerala moke'i bhaya karaa arau mora ayatasamuhara binimayata tuccha mulya kini nalaba. Allahe yi aratirna karaiche se'i anuyayi yisakale bidhana nidiye sihamte'i kaphira
